creditline: Lent by the Frederick R. Weisman Art Museum, University of Minnesota, Minneapolis
description: six sided covered box; body decoration divided into two bands, plain white lower and brown upper with white vertical and diagonal line patterns which run into cover; plain white glazed top
text: MacKenzie selected early works by his former student Mark Pharis as they preserve original thrown sense even though they were softly deformed. Although there is variation in decoration and form, MacKenzie thinks of them as a pair.
title: Covered Box
